title: Fedora Project Announces Fedora Atomic Desktops for Immutable Fedora Spins
description:
The Fedora Project introduces a new family of Fedora Linux spins, Fedora Atomic Desktops, as an umbrella for immutable Fedora Linux spins.

The post Fedora Project Announces Fedora Atomic Desktops for Immutable Fedora Spins appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
